heading: a royal licking
subheading: the mirror of london says new british stamps featuring prince edward and his bride-to-be are sucky. or, to be precise, the tabloid says two cheek-to-cheek portraits of the couple, looking self-satisfied in matching polo shirts were "the cheesiest of royal pictures yet taken." and that's saying something. the mirror had one word for the new stamps in its front-page headline: "yuk." edward and sophie rhys-jones are to be married in june.
author: wired staff
text: the mirror of london says new british stamps featuring prince edward and his bride-to-be are sucky. or, to be precise, the tabloid says two cheek-to-cheek portraits of the couple, looking self-satisfied in matching polo shirts were "the cheesiest of royal pictures yet taken." and that's saying something. the mirror had one word for the new stamps in its front-page headline: "yuk." edward and sophie rhys-jones are to be married in june.
